H3.text: who played the face in the a team. Dirk Benedict

A4.text: He is best known for playing the characters Lieutenant Starbuck in the original Battlestar Galactica film and television series and Templeton 'Face' Peck in The A-Team television series.

A5.text: In 1983, Dirk gained further popularity as con man Templeton 'Faceman' Peck in 1980s action television series The A-Team.
